Uses of Class
org.hs.jfc.CursorCenter.Descriptor

Packages that use CursorCenter.Descriptor
org.hs.jfc This package contains alternatives to some of the cumbersome facilities of the JFC. 
 

Uses of CursorCenter.Descriptor in org.hs.jfc
 

Methods in org.hs.jfc with parameters of type CursorCenter.Descriptor
 Cursor CursorCenter.getCursor(CursorCenter.Descriptor descriptor)
          Create, cache and return the cursor specified by descriptor, or retrieve it from the cache if it has been previously requested by a get method.
 Cursor CursorCenter.getCursor(CursorCenter.Descriptor descriptor, Color color)
          Create and cache the cursor specified by descriptor, or obtain it from the cache if it has already been created; and substitute all pixels of the chameleonColor provided by descriptor with color; then return the colorized cursor.
